title: Bionics: man or machine
creator_credit: Alan P. Sloan and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents a brief history of bionics, the science of copying nature. Examines some of the successful machines that have been created as a result of bionic research, and investigates some possibilities for the future. Suitable for upper secondary level.
